
set color?
// [1] = key, [3-5] = R,G,B (00-0f), [6] = layer 1
0000   1b 00 70 d2 1e fb 01 81 ff ff 00 00 00 00 09 00
0010   00 03 00 02 00 02 01 40 00 00 00 2e 08 00 0f 08
0020   0c 2a 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
0030   00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
0040   00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
0050   00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

get color?
// [1] = key, [6] = layer 1
0000   1b 00 a0 59 df fa 01 81 ff ff 00 00 00 00 09 00
0010   00 03 00 02 00 02 01 40 00 00 00 2c 08 00 00 00
0020   00 2a 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
0030   00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
0040   00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
0050   00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

get color response?
// [1] = key, [3-5] = R,G,B (00-0f), [6] = layer 1
0000   1b 00 e0 79 4d 01 02 81 ff ff 00 00 00 00 09 00
0010   01 03 00 02 00 82 01 40 00 00 00 2d 08 00 0f 08
0020   0c 2a 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 23 36 01 08 00
0030   e0 01 08 f9 ff ff ff 02 00 00 00 bd 27 00 20 cc
0040   a1 06 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 3b 55 01 08 ce
0050   7f 01 08 00 00 00 81 cc a1 06 00


INIT_CMD
30 00 00 00 00

KEY_REPORT_RESPONSE_CMD
05 08 5d aa c4 04 09 2a // [1] = key, [2-5] = serial, [7] = layer 1
ff ff ff ff 00 00 00 00 // [8-10] = layer 2-4
23 36 01 08 00 e0 01 08
f9 ff ff ff 2f 28 00 20
bd 27 00 20 ff 00 00 00
ff 00 00 00 01 00 00 00
3b 55 01 08 d0 7f 01 08
00 00 00 81 ff 00 00 00

KEY_REMOVED_CMD
1a 00 5d aa c4 04 09 2a // [2-5] = serial, [7] = layer 1
ff ff ff ff 03 00 00 00
23 36 01 08 00 e0 01 08
00 e0 01 08 00 e0 01 08
23 36 01 08 00 e0 01 08
f9 ff ff ff be 27 00 20
02 00 00 00 18 a7 93 03
00 00 00 00 03 00 00 00

KEY_ADDED_CMD
18 00 5d aa c4 04 09 00 // [2-5] = serial
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
23 36 01 08 00 e0 01 08
00 e0 01 08 00 e0 01 08
23 36 01 08 00 e0 01 08
f9 ff ff ff 01 00 00 00
02 00 00 00 f8 ab 93 03
00 00 00 00 03 00 00 00

KEY_ADDED_CMD
18 00 5d aa c4 04 09 2a // [2-5] = serial, [7] = layer 1
ff ff ff ff 00 00 00 00 // [8-10] = layer 2-4
23 36 01 08 00 e0 01 08
f9 ff ff ff 00 00 00 00
02 00 00 00 6c ec 93 03
00 00 00 00 03 00 00 00
37 55 01 08 32 82 01 08
00 40 00 61 6c ec 93 03

LAYER_PRESS_CMD (layer 1)
// [1] = key, [3] = layer_info
0000   1b 00 e0 79 4d 01 02 81 ff ff 00 00 00 00 09 00
0010   01 03 00 02 00 82 01 40 00 00 00[3c 18 01 d5 cc
0020   65 00 20 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01
0030   00 00 00 c9 03 01 00 02 00 00 00 00 e0 01 08 00
0040   e0 01 08 23 36 01 08 00 e0 01 08 f9 ff ff ff 00
0050   00 00 00 01 00 00 00 c9 03 01 00]

SYNC_CMD (layer 1)
46 01 03 00 16 d5 01 00 // [2] = press:02, depress:03, [4] = key,
						   [5] = layer_info,
						   [6] = layer_info & 3,
0000   1b 00 10 b0 d3 f4 01 81 ff ff 00 00 00 00 09 00
0010   00 03 00 01 00 02 01 40 00 00 00[46 01 02 02 19
0020   d5 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
0030   00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
0040   00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
0050   00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00]

LAYER_DEPRESS_CMD (layer 1)
// [1] = key, [3] = layer_info
0000   1b 00 d0 b0 4d 01 02 81 ff ff 00 00 00 00 09 00
0010   01 03 00 02 00 82 01 40 00 00 00[3e 18 01 d5 00
0020   65 00 20 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 23 36 01 08 00
0030   e0 01 08 00 e0 01 08 00 e0 01 08 23 36 01 08 00
0040   e0 01 08 f9 ff ff ff be 27 00 20 01 00 00 00 90
0050   05 01 00 01 00 00 00 03 00 00 00]

SYNC_CMD (layer 1)
0000   1b 00 90 f9 be fb 01 81 ff ff 00 00 00 00 09 00
0010   00 03 00 01 00 02 01 40 00 00 00[46 01 03 02 19
0020   d5 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
0030   00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
0040   00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
0050   00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00]

// layer 2
3c 1a 01 d7 cc 65 00 20
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
23 36 01 08 00 e0 01 08
00 e0 01 08 00 e0 01 08
23 36 01 08 00 e0 01 08
f9 ff ff ff be 27 00 20
04 00 00 00 51 db e6 03
01 00 00 00 03 00 00 00

46 01 02 00 1a d7 03 00

3e 1a 01 d7 00 65 00 20
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
23 36 01 08 00 e0 01 08
00 e0 01 08 00 e0 01 08
23 36 01 08 00 e0 01 08
f9 ff ff ff 0b 27 00 20
04 00 00 00 03 00 00 00
a4 60 00 20 04 00 00 00

46 01 03 00 1a d7 03 00

// layer 3
3c 1b 01 d6 cc 65 00 20
3c 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 e0 01 08 00 e0 01 08
23 36 01 08 00 e0 01 08
f9 ff ff ff 01 00 00 00
04 00 00 00 29 bc e7 03
01 00 00 00 03 00 00 00
01 84 01 08 a6 77 01 08

46 01 02 00 1b d6 02 00

3e 1b 01 d6 00 65 00 20
3c 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 e0 01 08 00 e0 01 08
23 36 01 08 00 e0 01 08
f9 ff ff ff 01 00 00 00
04 00 00 00 58 bc e7 03
00 00 00 00 03 00 00 00
01 84 01 08 a6 77 01 08

46 01 03 00 1b d6 02 00
